overview: As CEO and Co-founder of ServiceJockey.com, Inc., Jake has 10 years of entrepreneurial experience in the â€œBusiness to Consumerâ€ Sales arena specifically related to the utilization of internet leads as a vehicle to drive revenues. In his efforts to eliminate inefficiencies and improve conversion rates, he gained a considerable amount of knowledge about the lead generation industry and its lack of adaptation to new technologies and changes in consumer behavior. In addition to being involved in the day to day operations of Service Jockey, Jake is focusing on identifying and developing relationships with Strategic Partners, Sponsors, and Service Provider Associations. Jake was also a Co-founder and Vice President of Freehold Capital, Inc.
